text: Sometimes it is necessary to describe parts of the external format as an in_map , despite the lack of interest in processing the decoded data. That is, when there are more complex types of filler data and this information is to be discarded. Example - discard_output specification in_map FillerInMap: external(FillerRecord), internal(EmptyInternal), discard_output { automatic; }; in_map DataInMap: external(DataRecord), target_internal(DataTarget) { automatic; }; decoder TotalDecoder: in_map(FillerInMap), in_map(DataInMap); This example produces DataTarget UDRs and discards any filler (assuming that the referred formats are properly defined).
title: discard_output Specification - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
